org.nodes.algorithms

Class Nauty

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nodes.algorithms.Nauty

  • public class Nauty
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a general implementation of the nauty algorithm, originally by McKay. TODO: Implement automorphism pruning TODO: Implement a separate refine for directed graphs. It should separate by in and out degree. Behavior is still correct, but slower.
    Author:
    Peter
